title: 【1.9新怪物：雪人？】
author: 幸福君
txt_content:
Notch recently tweeted about a new mob, which appears to be an assembled snowman! Few details were released about its nature, abilities or behavior, but it seems safe to say that it would likely spawn in snow biomes, leave snow trails and fire off snowballs. 


Additionally - we have exciting news for the forums! In the near future, we will be implementing a new Streaming feature for the site, to allow us the ability to stream all things Minecraft. This is where you, the community come in - we want to hear what you want streamed! Notch doing things? Let's Play videos? Anything at all! Make your suggestions in this thread, and we will compile and vote on the top suggestions, as decided by the community!


===================================


看起来是个安全的东西，出生在雪地什么的。
